UX Case Study - The Plant Store

A brick-and-mortar plant store wanted to create an e-commerce site to grow their business and capitalize on some national press they had received. People who did not live in the area called them to see if they could ship them some of their specialty plants through the mail. This gave the owners the idea to create an online portal to facilitate non-local sales.

Personas

A brick-and-mortar plant store wanted to create an e-commerce site to grow their business and capitalize on some national press they had received. People who did not live in the area called them to see if they could ship them some of their specialty plants through the mail. This gave the owners the idea to create an online portal to facilitate non-local sales.
